input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "JAXXON"
Reference Product Name: "14k Silver Cuban Link Chain - 8mm"
Reference Product Description:
Introducing our silver 8mm stainless steel Cuban Link Chain â€“ a statement of timeless elegance and enduring strength. Crafted with precision and exceptional resiliency, this chain is designed to withstand tarnishing, corrosion, and daily wear. Elevate your style with its bold 8mm gauge and classic Cuban link design, making it the perfect choice for any occasions.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Gold Cuban Link Bracelet'
  - Name='JAXXON NY Silver Pendant Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Link Silver Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Bracelet'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Link Bracelet'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Iced Out Cuban Link'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Link Silver Bracelet'
  - Name='Craftd London Cuban Silver Necklace'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Link Silver Chain, 22"'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm Cuban Link'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Silver Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Link'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm Cuban Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON Iced Out Skyline Silver Pendant Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON Youth Cuban Gold Chain Stack'
  - Name='JAXXON Combine Silver Pendant Chain'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Cuban link style but is a bracelet, not a chain, and differs in size (10mm vs 8mm) and material color (gold vs silver).
Silver chain but likely a pendant chain rather than a Cuban link and no size specified, so medium relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Cuban link style and some similarity in form, but larger gauge (10mm), gold color and iced out feature reduce relevancy.
Same Cuban link silver chain but smaller gauge (5mm vs 8mm), very similar product type and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cuban link and bracelet type similar, but different size (10mm), color (gold), and iced out style reduce relevancy.
Cuban link gold chain with slightly larger size (10mm vs 8mm) and different color but similar chain product and construction.
Cuban link bracelet shares construction but differs in product type (bracelet vs chain), likely similar style.
Matches 8mm size and Cuban link style but iced out feature and unspecified if chain or bracelet slightly reduce relevancy.
Silver Cuban link bracelet matches material and style but differs in product type (bracelet vs chain).
Cuban link silver necklace similar style and purpose; different brand but same core product features.
Same brand, Cuban link silver chain matching core style, only length specified but very similar to reference.
Same brand and style but much smaller gauge (3mm) reduces size similarity; chain or bracelet unclear.
Matches 8mm size, Cuban link style and silver material; 'set' may include multiple items but core chain is likely similar.
Exact match in brand, size, style and material; identical product type.
Same brand and style but smaller 3mm size and 'set' implies multiple pieces, reducing exact similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Iced Out Skyline Silver Pendant Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Silver pendant chain but different link style (skyline vs Cuban) and iced out; less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Youth Cuban Gold Chain Stack
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Cuban link style and brand, but gold color, youth sizing and stack format reduce closeness to reference.
Silver pendant chain but different style (combine pendant) and likely different construction than Cuban link.
